pullrequest.title: Components Part 2: Move header files to component folders

content.raw:
I did that in my original attempt to split out the components, but that significantly increases the complexity of splitting the components, because every

```
#include "ignition/common/<header>.hh"
```

in every source file needs to be updated to

```
#include "ignition/common/<component>/<header>.hh"
```

so it creates a lot more work, and makes it harder to deal with merge conflicts. This would also have negative impacts on consumers of `ign-common`.
